organic.title: Center for Hope & Safety | Serving Victims and Survivors Of ...
organic.snippet: Our agency offers a safe refuge and support to victims and survivors of domestic violence, sexual assault, stalking and human trafficking.

organic.title: Contact Info | About Us - Center for Hope & Safety
organic.snippet: Advocacy Office Hours ... Due to Covid-19, our in-person services are limited. For everyone's health and safety, please call the hotline and speak with advocate ...

organic.title: About Us - Center for Hope & Safety
organic.snippet: Center for Hope & Safety (formerly Shelter Our Sisters) is dedicated to assisting Bergen County, NJ victims and survivors of domestic violence.
